name: Mushroom Forest (MrDoctorb)
description:
Mushroom Forest is a short visual demo for a puzzle platformer where you, a mushroom, kill various forest creatures to act as fertilizer to make other mushrooms in the forest grow. 

Controls:

A/D: Walk Left/Right
Space: Jump
Hold Down Arrow: Charge Projectile
Up Arrow: Open Menu
Left/Right Arrow: Navigate Menu/Aim
